title: [Saewehna Lagoon, Shore]
description: Thick grass and flourishing plant life provides a lush retreat from the murky water, the shoreline easily transforming from the water-smoothed stones of the lagoon bed to the rich soil of the jungle floor.  The night breeze circulating through the area is refreshing, and the canopy of trees contributes to the shadows inundating the jungle.

Thick grass and flourishing plant life provides a lush retreat from the water, the shoreline easily transforming from the water-smoothed stones of the lagoon bed to the rich soil of the jungle floor.  A cool breeze circulating through the area is refreshing, and the canopy of trees provides an additional respite from the heat of the day.
room.location: the environs of the Saewehna Lagoon
